category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 21 (Approval of Comprehensive Business Plan)
contents: Article 21 (Approval of comprehensive business plan) ① The comprehensive plan shall be submitted to the Korean Sports Council by the host city/province, and the comprehensive plan shall contain detailed action plans for holding the comprehensive competition (event overview, competition symbols, budget requirements, comprehensive situation room, executive department, etc. ) refers to a plan prepared. Newly established on January 24, 2022. ② The host city/province that has decided to hold the event must consult with the Sports Council on general matters regarding preparations for the competition at any time and decide on them, and the comprehensive business plan for the competition must be implemented after obtaining approval from the Sports Council at least one year before the competition. do.
